wikipedia_page.main: June Andrews, , is a Scottish nurse who is a world-renowned expert in dementia studies and aged care. She was the professor of dementia studies at the Dementia Services Development Centre at the University of Stirling. She is now Professor Emeritus.  She has written many publications on the topics of dementia, care homes and geriatric care.

response: * June Andrews, nursing expert, director of NHS Scotland Centre for Change and Innovation, professor of dementia studies at University of Stirling"Head of NHS Change and Innovation Centre", Scottish Government, 11 April 2002.
*Professor June Andrews – Lately Director, The Dementia Services Development Centre, University of Stirling. For services to People with Dementia.
